home.description: Passionate about programming, I specialize in both Front-End and Back-End development. Constant evolution drives me, and I enjoy sharing knowledge with colleagues. Join me on this development journey!

about.title: Who I am
about.description: Hello! I'm Jonatan Atadia, born on March 31, 1989, in Bragado, Buenos Aires, Argentina. From an early age, I've been passionate about programming, but it was in 2017, when I found myself unemployed, that I decided to fully immerse myself in the world of development. My first steps as a self-taught individual marked the beginning of a journey dedicated to exploration and constant learning. I devoured books and tutorials, explored various technologies and languages, and became a versatile developer. My main motivation is the continuous desire to learn. Since then, I haven't stopped working and studying to evolve as a developer. I enjoy sharing knowledge with my fellow developers, and I believe the best working environment is one that challenges me to constantly evolve. Ready to discover more about my journey in development and programming?
about.link: Check out some of my latest projects.
